name: Outfished
description:
The time of the fishermen is over. It is time to rise up! Take control of the fish and bite back. Steal away the fishing poles and send the fishers packing!

Outfished was developed in 72 hours for the Coding Blocks Jam '23. The theme "Everything is Backwards" inspired reversing the roles of the classic fishing game.

Credits

Art/UI/Animation: Iain MacQuarrie (https://imacquarrie.itch.io/)

Background Art: Anya (https://biryuk.tumblr.com)

Programming: DOGKaiser (https://dogkaiser.itch.io/)

Audio: Zakkuu (https://zakkuu.itch.io/)

QA: Brad Bower (https://buraddo.itch.io/)
